title: More Armadillos
body: So Rammus is out looking for creatures like him. What i wanna know is will he ever find one. I'd personally love to see more Rammus-like champs, obviously not exactly like him but sour of like the yordles, where they are all distinct from one another.

replies.body:
I cant help but think that champs like amumu and rammus would have never made it into the game if they were designed today...

That said, i honestly cant imagine what riot could do with another armordillo...

A bit like all those 1 off races really, like how we wont see any more rengars, trundles, rammus's or wukongs
you won't see any more of the champs. They are supposed to be unique.
I don't riot would make a champion like that.
